name: lead
description: A soft dull metal known since ancient times.  Due to its malleability it has a wide variety of uses including the manufacture of ammunition.

name: scrap metal
description: An bulky assortment of small bits of scrap steel useful in all kinds of crafting
//: Density 7.60g/cm続 ~ 1.9kg/250ml @ 50g/unit ~ stack 40 but fragments stacks poorly so only 25% of this

name: chunk of steel
description: A misshapen chunk of steel.  Makes a decent weapon in a pinch, and is also useful for some crafting recipes.
//: Density 7.60g/cm続 ~ 1.9kg/250ml @ 250g/unit ~ stack 8 but mishapen so only 50% of this

name: lump of steel
description: A heavy formed piece of steel.  Useful for some crafting recipes.
//: Density 7.60g/cm続 ~ 1.9kg/250ml @ 1000g/unit ~ stack 2 and formed as a solid ingot so 100% of this
